Question
========
How can you run code line by line from the editor in Positron?

Answerlist
----------
* Only the Run button can execute code
* You must copy code into the Terminal manually
* Place the cursor on a line and press Ctrl/Cmd + Enter to execute it
* Line-by-line execution is not supported

Solution
========
Use Ctrl/Cmd + Enter to execute the current line (and step through subsequent lines) directly from the editor.
